name: SAS: Zombie Assault 3
description: SAS: Zombie Assault 3 is an online game that runs directly from the browser in which the player's objective is to survive the infestation of murderous zombies. In it, you must join forces with other players around the world to increase your chances of succeeding during missions.

name: War After
description: Constant conflict between the nations and diminishing resources brought an end to the world as we knew it. Resources became scarce and several factions will stop at nothing to get what remains. Answer a call of duty and join one of the factions’ special forces in a post-apocalyptic world of eternal crossfire confrontation. Fight on several fallout arenas, choose and upgrade weapons, fighters and gears to dominate the world and lead your division to victory. Rise your rank through battles to access better shooting equipment!

name: New Revolution
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirate Raid: Caribbean Battle
description: Ahoy me hearties! Ready to hoist the mainsail, batten down the hatches and blaze your way across the Caribbean in search of plunder, glory, and hours of pirate fun? Down your grog and grab your cutlass, it’s all hands on deck in this fast-paced pirate simulator that will really float your boat. Race full-sail across the high seas to do battle with simple merchantmen, naval battleships, and fearsome sea monsters, all while filling your coffers with booty to spend on expanding your tropical island hideaway and upgrading your mighty pirateship in preparation for ever fiercer battles and more dastardly buccaneering further into the game!

name: Mini Golf RPG
description:
Fight dangerous monsters in an epic turn-based RPG - one golf stroke at a time.
Explore an RPG dungeon like never before by golfing your team to victory. Encounter themed enemies after every shot and stronger bosses after completing a hole. Fighting side by side with your team of caddies, can you grow strong enough to return peace to the mini-golf world?

name: Black Clover Mobile
description: Black Clover Mobile is a licensed RPG based on the popular anime series from "Shonen Jump" (Shueisha) and TV Tokyo. Immerse yourself in a magical fantasy world, experience classic original storylines while enjoying an easy to play strategy turn-based gameplay. Summon your favorite characters, cultivate a powerful magic knight squad, and embark on the journey to become the Wizard King.

name: Gorilla Online!
description:
Real time online survival games with friends.

When the game starts, one "survivor" is chosen from among the players, and the "gorilla" is the "human".
The "gorilla" wins by capturing the "survivor".
The gorilla wins by catching the survivor, and the survivor wins by running away from the gorilla until the end of the game.

The gorilla must use teamwork and a variety of skills acquired by eating bananas to hunt down the survivor.

Survivors can only run away, but they can use radar to pinpoint the gorilla's location. If you can escape, you'll get a lot of coins and G-stones!

In addition, if the "Survivor" collects all of the "Gorilla Treasures" that exist on the stage, he will be able to collect ....?

name: Next Station: Jianghu
description: Sin descripción

name: Tower of God M: The Great Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Fierce Tide
description: Sin descripción

name: Infinity Conflict
description: Sin descripción

name: Tap Wizard 2
description: Choose your Spells, Perks, and Traits, then let the Wizard do all of the work in this unique Idle RPG! Tap Wizard 2 is a fusion of the Idle, Incremental, ARPG, and Twin-Stick Shooter genres, resulting in a game like no other!

name: Among Waifus 18+
description: Among Waifus 18+ is a casual game with original puzzle mechanics based on runners. To experience the whole journey with these sexy girls you have to win a variety of levels by finding the escape of levels.

name: Pegaxy
description:
Pegaxy (Pegasus Galaxy) is a racing game with futuristic mythological styling. Pega (the horses) are descendants of the mighty Pegasus. In this game, players will participate in PvP format races to win rewards in the platforms native utility token, VIS (Vigorus).

Pegaxy has a very unique ecosystem that allows players to enter any race, for free. With this economic model, gameplay is very competitive, however the rewards are still lucrative. Players compete against 14 other racers in an attempt to earn a top 3 placement. All players inside the top 3 earn VIS tokens, the platforms utility token. Knowledge, strategy and skill are all required to place in the top 3. Be prepared to race, dedicate time and be one with your Pega, the rewards will make it all worthwhile.

name: Next Door: An Eternal World
description: Tactical Isekai RPG by various races

name: Vavala
description: Vavala is not a simple puzzles and riddles adventure. Its atmosphere and artwork will turn the different challenges of each stage into real feats, making your journey a unique and beautiful experience.

name: Irehon
description: Action MMORPG game in fantasy world. Explore the world, craft your weapon and equipment, engage in fights with other players and unravel the secrets of this strange world with your friends.

name: The Phoenix
description: The Phoenix is an action-platform video game inspired by Capcom's classic Mega Man games.Run, jump, climb and shoot your way through 5 levels, each culminating in a boss battle with a supervillain.

name: Jia Ran er Zhi De Yin Fu
description: Sin descripción

name: Rorys Restaurant Origins
description: Help our sweet Rory in this hidden object game to get through Culinary School! Find cooking ingredients to cook over 30 delicious dishes from all over the world and serve customers to receive tips and upgrade your restaurant.

name: Bugs From Space
description: A fast-paced VR arcade shooter, where you fire guns, shoot energy bows, and toss explosive spears to defend your base from an alien infestation. The bugs shoot back, so don't forget to duck!

name: Eira
description: "Eira" is a role-playing game developed by the independent team "Gearonin". In this game, you will play a girl named "Rui" who just turned 15 years old. Together with the thoughtful and handsome butler "Ralph", she runs and protects the ancient magic shop left by Rui's grandmother "Eira.

name: Exploria
description: An adventurous RPG with a variety of different equipments and great sceneries.

name: Turpedo
description: A fast paced 2-4 multiplayer party game where players incarnate submarines for victory over polluted oceans. Evolve as you play with a range of mutations in round based combat over multiple game modes.

name: I am on Fire
description: The flames, the screams, the heat, it was like a nightmare that would never go away, and I woke up to find that I was the only one left in the land, and I went all the way south to get rid of the pain.

name: Fighting Heart
description: FIGHTING HEART is a 3D 1v1 fighting game, bringing the speed and precision of classic fighters into the third dimension.

name: Invasion: Neo Earth
description: Retro turn-based strategy in a sci-fi world of sinister alien invaders. Take command of troops, tanks and aircraft as you position your units for the perfect strike or unbreakable defense. Plot the course of humanity's war against the insidious Sectyd by choosing your own missions.

name: How to Sing to Open Your Heart: Remastered
description: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Sing to Open Your Heart" returns as a remastered version. Princess Myana, who loves to sing, finally comes to Eroolia. A lot of people, like the Imperial Guard Captain, Ludovic, and Princess Anna, are unhappy about it. What will happen?

name: Ancient Wars: Sparta Definitive Edition
description: One of the most innovative Real-Time Strategy Games comes back totally renewed and improved to the smallest detail, with epic large scale battles, new civilizations, unit customization system never seen before in a game, 8K support, and a lot of more.

name: Moe Girl
description: Moe Girl is a jigsaw puzzle.

name: Nonstop
description: This is a "This War of Mine" like game with 2D pixel art style. You need to manage your resources and find a way to survive on Planet Carol.

name: Swinging-Man
description: Swing yourself across the city, attack enemies with your momentum. A mini swinging rogue-like action game.

name: Planetkillerz: Death of a world in five acts.
description: The world is ending. It's up to a small group of misfits to figure out what that actually is going to look like, and what the post-apocalypse will actually bring forth.

name: Leningrad
description: Cataclysm destroyed the sky and the earth, but it didn't destroy "Leningrad" - an autonomous underwater city-fortress. It is up to you to take on the role of the Captain of the "Leningrad". The future of the ship and its citizens depends on your actions.

name: GunsBox VR
description: Have you ever shot a revolver? Now grab one, feel its coldness and weight, install a scope, and make a goddamn perfect shot. Learn how to use and customize different types of guns. Create levels and share them with the community. We've created this sandbox inspired by the popular VR titles for you.

name: Gomu
description: Meet Gomu ! A 2D platformer game with several environments. Grab, swing and go to an adventure in order to get back the stars Gomu made fall and put it back in the sky

name: Spirit of Adventure
description: "Spirit of Adventure" is a classical 2.5D dungeon crawl RPG game in which you'll take charge of a group of adventurers searching for the next callenge.

name: Mathletix
description: A puzzle game that utilizes the basic principles of math, all set against gorgeous backgrounds and a relaxing, lofi soundtrack. Players must arrange numbers and operators into proper equations in the style of crossword puzzles.

name: Knight's Try
description: Knight's Try is a tough platformer with retro 64 bit 3D graphics. Take on the role of an honorable Knight of Trye attempting to complete their sacred pilgrimage by leaping through a world full of perilous pitfalls and dangerous traps!

name: Boom Wars
description: Boom Wars is an Action Multiplayer Game , Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win .

name: Shoot!
description: Shooting, flying, using a shield, night vision... That is "Shoot!". VR shooter game, which requires a little bit of thinking. In our game, you will become a superhero, who has to save the others. Try it now and don't forget "With great power, comes great responsibility."!

name: Village RPG
description: Create a hero and fight your enemies in 2D Village RPG with your friends. A huge world, PVE arena, and Dungeons are already waiting for you!

name: 1000 Needles
description: 1000 Needles - is the simplest 2D platformer with dynamic gameplay and nice graphics where you will have to do various levels playing as a porcupine.

name: Ghost
description: Ghost is a first-person horror game made in realistic 3D graphics that immerses you in an atmosphere of horror and scares you in every way. The main goal is to survive and be saved.

name: Jing Shi Jie
description: Sin descripción

name: I Don't Think I've Walked This Stretch of Road Before
description: Walk the length of your memories on a lonely country highway. Follow the signal. Return to the place you left behind. Piece together a truth you can live with. A short, ambiguous narrative adventure game.

name: Life is Paine
description: Life is Paine is a humorous Point and Click Adventure where you play a bard which has lost his voice due to an unfortunate accident and tries to regain it.

name: Don't Push Me
description: Square off against your friends in this life-or-death shoving simulator! 2 Player Local Competitive 1v1. Best played with gamepads.

name: The Resolve
description: Procedural Generation, City Builder, Idle Clicker.. Yes.

name: Broken
description: The truth is here, we are not alone... Explore a beautiful island and unravel the mysteries to discover the secrets of this sci-fi adventure with a plot twist like no other.

name: Wald & Gutz: Under Rocks
description: A 2D maze puzzle game with the feel of a runner. The two characters are alternately controlled, where the objective is to open the correct doors of the dungeon to get to the exit as quickly as possible before everything collapses.

name: Fleshgait
description: Fleshgait is an atmospheric survival horror game; play as Orion or Clay Mara, in their search for Damien Mara. Dynamic systems alter the game as you play.

name: A Flicker of Light
description: A catastrophe swept across the world. By an accident, my family and I were caught in a whirlpool of crime. How should I struggle to get out and save everything I cherish... or carry up all the sins I've done and keep going?

name: One Time In Space
description: Build and navigate your ship as it barrels through space. Machines, pipes, and wiring; all necessities to keep your ship running. Survive and explore.

name: Cosmos Conquer
description: The technologically advanced humanity starts looking for other planets to conquer. Now that the Earth is depleted of its resources, we're looking for them elsewhere. The Universe is open for us now - and it cannot hide any secrets. So how will you conquer it?

name: Imperial Arms: Curse of the Conqueror
description: Imperial Arms is a grid-based, tactical RPG with classic style pixel graphics and level design.

name: SlimeSlider
description: SlimeSlider is a puzzle game about navigating levels by pushing boxes. In each level, you must push boxes in order to overcome (or take advantage of) your tendency to slide in order to direct the blob to the exit portal.

name: RocketBallZ
description: A game where balls are king. Where teams have to keep the ball on the other side to bring down the opposing team's countdown. The first team with no time remaining loses the game!

name: Spirits of Light
description: An action adventure game with a premise based on the Little Red Riding Hood tale and Souls-Like mechanics.

name: Ytbb
description: Sin descripción

name: VRkanoid
description: The mix between a brick-breaking-style game and racketball. It is a game of breaking walls by hitting the ball. Utilize various power-ups, buffs, and rackets to clear the stages faster. Concentrate and keep your eyes on the ball.

name: Requiem
description: Five adventurers walk into the Dream. Requiem is a 3rd-Person action storybook adventure.

name: Kilroy Was Here
description: You are stuck in an unknown place, completely alone for eternity. Every decision you’ve made, will make, and could have made somehow rattling around your head. The only thing you can understand is a rock, with a gratified picture and some text that reads ‘Kilroy Was Here’!

name: Miyamoto S
description: Open the box of the board game and enter the beautiful world of samurai!

name: Militaristic Rain of Terror
description: Militaristic Rain of Terror is a First-Person Multiplayer game where you fight for victory on different maps. The game features new maps, weapons, skins, game modes, attachmentsand delivers updated versions of the classic content. Prove your skill and be the best.

name: Cygnus Racing League
description: On your marks! Get Set! SURVIVE! The Cygnus Galaxy invites you to join one of the greatest sporting spectacles in the known universe, The Cygnus Racing League!

name: Marimo vs. I.A.S
description: A 2.5D shooter with old-fashioned side-scrolling and a way to attack enemies in the background. Fight with lock-on shots that can track up to 6 enemies appearing from the back of the screen at the same time, and forward charge shots that can penetrate enemies and enemy bullets.

name: Heroes of Britannia
description: RPG game with Vikings, Saxons and Romans in ancient Medieval Britannia, now invaded by zombies and other creatures of darkness. Old enmities and alliances must be rethought, for everyone's survival.

name: Light: Black Cat & Amnesia Girl
description: "Light" is a 3D adventure puzzle game, in which you play as a cat. You will help a little girl who has lost her memory escape by leading her through four-level mazes with different style.

name: Project Shanto Rancher
description: Project Shanto Rancher is a Creature Collecting game, in which you create your own ranch, and fill it with the creatures you capture along the way. Explore 6 different regions and unlock the mysteries of the world of Shanto.

name: Gem Raider 2
description: Gem Raider 2 is an old-school move-and-shoot game. Your objective in each room is to destroy all of the Power Gems and return to the teleport pad to exit. Other Gems can also be destroyed to increase your score. There are 20 rooms and each of the 9 types of enemy Gems has unique weapons or skills.

name: Slime Islands
description: Its a puzzle-game where you need to collect different sorts of baby slimes and use them to get through the level. Free up as many slimes u can for more points.

name: Multigravity
description: Change the direction of gravity to survive and navigate the Labyrinth.

name: How to Fool a Liar King: Remastered
description: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Fool a Liar King" returns as a remastered version. Regina, a girl who loves cats, a bit forgetful but confident in her strength, suddenly appears inside a forest in Eroolia. Juli immediately finds her, but how did she get here?

name: The Augury House
description: The Augury House is a shifting collection of short experiences and exhibitions. Contents change weekly.

name: Spooky Story
description: Spooky story - In this creepy platformer, you will get the role of a magic mushroom that went hunting for the treasures of elves. Carefully jump across the platforms to reach the goal

name: So Long as There is Mercy
description: Lead Spe, the game‘s protagonist, through an eerie dollhouse in an effort to find her little brother. On her way, Spe will encounter the ghost-children, who are also trapped, and can use their different abilities to solve the environmental puzzles in order to escape the house.

name: Project Kunai
description: Project Kunai is a super fast FPS/Platformer game which you can use special abilitys and Kunai. Reach highest speed and complate levels fastest yo can. Learn the truth about Project Kunai and your past.

name: I've Seen Everything
description: In the "I've Seen Everything" quiz, you will need to recognize what is being shown in the picture and choose the correct answer out of four options. There are several game modes: single-player mode with an AI, no opponent mode, and multiplayer mode (four players maximum).

name: I've Seen Everything: More Actresses
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Actresses" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Actors
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Actors" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Animals
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Animals" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Painters
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Painters" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Musical Instruments
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Musical Instruments" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Minerals
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Minerals" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Fishes
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Fishes" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Singers
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Singers" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Mythological Creatures
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Mythological Creatures" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Dinosaurs
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Dinosaurs" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Persons
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Persons" category.

name: I've Seen Everything: More Fruits
description: This DLC contains additional questions for the "Fruits and Vegetables" category.

name: OtterQuest
description: You’ve been given an odd request, and without protest, you get dressed and grab your sword from your weapons chest, and with much zest, you head west to complete your Otter Quest.

name: Dicey Towers
description: Dicey Towers is a unique tower defense hybrid that includes a variety of unique enemies, towers, and bosses. Upgrade, combine and, manage your towers to defeat countless waves of enemies as they attempt to breach your kingdom.

name: Hell Mission
description: There are 9 chapters in this game Players will play the most capable agent "Eva" to face a huge number of undead and powerful cyborg warriors. The operation of this game is very simple, with gorgeous movie-like visual effects, allowing players to experience shocking sensory stimulation.

name: Math Game
description: Math Game is a logic game for the speed of solving simple math problems.

name: Ambushed
description: Play with your team and do your best!

name: Cyber Manhunt: Hello World
description: Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death with the important documents. Just when Benjamin began to investigate the truth of the death, he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

name: Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey
description: "Nelson and the Magic Cauldron: The Journey" is a classic point & click adventure, with lots of puzzles and funny dialogues.

name: Lataman
description: Lataman the punk that fights the punks because they ruined the punk.

name: Hentai Jigsaw Puzzle 2
description: Kawaii girls are broken into pieces. Can you reunite them by completing these jigsaw puzzles?

name: Sweet Collector
description: A cute 2D puzzle game with sweets and cakes that will make you relax! If you just want to have a bit of time for yourself. Arrange your 50 sweet friends on the grid of 100 levels.

name: Gem Rifts
description: Ancient portals have been lying dormant, waiting for daring adventurers to travel between worlds. Your task is to lead an expedition through one of these portals, research and build defenses around it, and protect it from hostile guardian life forms.

name: Tyroom vs. Typing Gunner
description: Our typing gunner robot must survive in the feared Tyroom, lucky him he'll help him. Type words to teleport, explode bombs, destroy towers while you dodge and shoot robots down! Try to survive all the waves and get to the top of the leaderboard!

name: Moveit
description: A touching story and a unique narrative with puzzles.

name: A Tale About Flowers
description: A Tale About flowers is a short visual novel in a cyberpunk city where you play as Canaan. As you investigate a murder you uncover some secrets you shouldn't have. What will be your fate ? Make choices to get one of the multiple endings.

name: Mall of Mayhem
description: What is Mall of Mayhem? Mall of Mayhem is an open world action game about an assassin with an exo suit stuck in a time loop. It's like Groundhog Day, but you cause more mayhem.

name: Rogue Tower
description: Rogue Tower is a tower defense game with roguelike elements and a continuously expanding path which you can influence. Unlock new towers and buildings, build up your defenses, upgrade your towers through card draws and cash, expand the path tactically to control how enemies move and defend your tower.

name: The Last Bastion
description: The Last Bastion is a survival-management game where you lead an army of defeated soldiers across a setting inspired by medieval India. Fight overwhelming forces, manage dwindling resources and make choices with devastating consequences in a bitter struggle for survival and salvation.

name: Pk2022
description: "Pk2022"Is a 3D racing game.

name: Attack of the Giant Crab
description: Take control of the Giant Crab and cause the maximum amount of destruction while brushing off the military's puny attempts to stop you.

name: Bounty Hunters
description: Bounty Hunters is a Third Person Shooter set in a Cyberpunk themed City It uses a Horde/Firefight type game system to throw waves of bad guys at the player, your job is to survive and kill the boss.

name: Relic Adventure
description: It is said that only the most brave and wise people could pass the exam, and get the treasure in the ancient relic. In the great maze, you should not only find out but also make the correct ways appear. Most challengers fails. could You Pass It?

name: Kami Mahou
description: 跨越国家、时代和疆域的争论，英雄用传记、人民用历史堆叠论据。尽头，什么在等待着我们呢？ ——为纪念猫猫社20周年，由片冈智首部完全独立执笔，中日创作者共同制作的的“历史穿越系”长篇连载全篇，凝聚于此。

name: KamiYaba: Destiny on a Dicey Deadline
description: "If you don't tie the knot with the person of your dreams within the next year, you'll be in big trouble." So forewarns Urara, the self-proclaimed Goddess of Matchmaking... kicking off a rowdy rom-com adventure!

name: Avalanches
description: A cold top-down avalanches survival game. Can you sustain avalanches? You must survive to find a way to escape avalanche valley. Or live there, its up to you!

name: Mireille and Amrita, the Forest of Illusions
description: Mireille was a nun living in a small village in the mountains. One day, her sick father's illness takes a turn for the worse. To find the materials needed to cure his illness, the girl goes out on an adventure.

name: Accelerating Hotkeys
description: Try and survive working as a corporate drone while typing your anger away, making money hand over fist.

name: The Leeds Devil
description: Explore the moonlit heart of the New Jersey Pine Barrens in this atmospheric, 1-bit horror game. Press into the backwoods' dark depths, where entities forgotten and strange tread in step with the spirits of the past. And above all... beware the Devil.

name: Rogue Dungeon
description: Based on the board game, Rogue Dungeon is a solo dungeon crawler. It plays like an old-school roguelike, using hand management, card draw and dice rolling as primary game mechanics. Players will need to figure out how best to use their hero abilities, skills, items, experience and luck to survive.

name: Infinity BattleSoul
description: "Infinite BattleSoul" is a action Roguelite adventure game. Players can fight alone, form battle squads with friends, and use characters with different abilities to fight. Build the most suitable combination of ZhanHunQi to feel the most enjoyable combat experience brought.

name: Destroy Simulator
description: Destroy houses and relieve stress. It is also possible to compete with everyone in the score challenge

name: Fallen Spirit
description: Find the surface, free the Light.

name: Mystery of the Missing Brigantine
description: An exciting Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game which takes you on the amazing journey of treasure hunters who need your help to find the missing person. Enjoy hours of fun in this mystic, storydriven game!

name: Cellar
description: A story-focused game about six strangers stuck together for a month, and a machine that must be kept running.

name: City Retreat
description: Shoot zombies! Find new weapons! Unlock new characters and cars, arrive at the airport and escape!

name: Waifu Crush
description: Day after day, tired of your current real life, you decide to join a virtual simulation game then change your life here. Encountering girls, making friends with them, hiring them to work for you and become a real boss!

name: Gogte
description: In Gogte you will know a different universe from the one lived up to now, creatures that left our cruel world behind to found The Dungeon of Madness. Located in a parallel universe where no mortal can reach. They prepare the long-awaited end of the world.

name: 多宝修仙
description: This is a turn-based strategy immortal cultivation game, where you can subdue spiritual pets from all walks of life, refine exclusive magic weapons, and meet immortals and Taoists. My cultivation is my master!

name: Fantasy Mosaics 35: Day at the Museum
description: Enjoy the challenge of Zen mosaic puzzles, explore the museum and discover fun mini games! The gameplay features secret colors. All puzzles are based on logic.

name: Otome no Himitsu
description: Otome No Himitsu is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Get Achievements for Achievements
description: The main goal of this game is to get achievements.

name: Legend of Keepers: Feed the Troll
description: Including new master, new monsters, new game mechanics and more!

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Salsa
description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Byzantium and Hispania - and Salt - a new trading good - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!

name: Detective Agency
description: Exciting adventure game with a stylish comic graphics and lots of puzzles, riddles and mini games. Fun for the whole family.

name: Deflector
description: Deflector is a high-octane bullet hell roguelite set in a deadly world. Upgrade your characters with the DNA you find, evolve them further during your runs and explore the farthest reaches of this microcosm… or die trying.

name: Doge to the Moon
description: An action game that will test your reaction and teach you how to adjust to timings...

name: James Peris 2: The Fountain of Eternal Drunkenness
description: The long awaited new adventure by James Peris, after No License, No Control, Much more of everything! A point-and-click adventure with adult humor and a touch of hooliganism. Totally open gameplay and non-linear puzzles.

name: UnnamedGame RPG
description: Enjoy a semi-AFK RNG-HELL RPG game that is ever expanding, find loot, own, get owned, all in the name of RNG. Climb leaderboards for overall XP, gather money, and become a part of a growing game and community!

name: Bunny Raiders
description: Sin descripción

name: From Heaven to Earth
description: Find your way down to earth in this amazing platformer game

name: Pokémon Ethos
description:
Pokémon Ethos is a fan made Pokémon game. It is not a ROM hack, but rather a game made in RPG Maker XP, using the Pokemon Essentials kit.

When your father goes missing during a routine trip to Juletone City, it's up to you to discover his whereabouts!
Travel through a region fresh off the heels of legalized Pokémon training, battling the newly established Gym Leaders on your way.
Hone your skills for the inevitable confrontation with NOVA: The National Outcry of Valiant Allies!
Learn the truth of what happened to your father on that faithful night with the "help" of your rival, the superhero wannabe: Howlight Harlequin!

This game was made by Voltseon, ENLS, Thundaga & NocTurn.

name: Matchpoint: Tennis Championships
description: Matchpoint: Tennis Championships is a modern take on tennis, featuring a true-to-life on-court experience supported by a deep career mode and unique rivalry system. The game places a strong focus on tactical realism, positioning and aiming, allowing the player to move their tennis star in exactly the right way to get the most out of their shots.

name: Showdown
description:
Showdown is a competitive PvP shooter that will make your heart beat faster!

You will be divided into two teams and placed in a kind of battle arena.
The battle between the two teams takes place on 3 levels with different layouts.​

Three maze-like levels await you. The first two levels have lifting platforms for variety, and the third level even has teleporters.

name: The Mourning Star
description:
Wield the last Star as a cosmic flail in this existential action game.

In a dying universe, a ghostly figure with amnesia finds themselves with the power to restore everything. Wielding the final star they perform a perilous ritual to bring about another Big Bang. Over countless cycles Deah learns about life, death, and their true nature.

name: Crysis 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Math Circus: Act 1
description: Math Circus: Act 1 is an educational game for children that teaches maths. All of the game's activities are based around setting up and managing a circus with twelve puzzles and activities in total. Each one introduces a new concept based around logic or maths with an adjustable difficulty level. Skills include spatial reasoning, perceiving patterns in size, order or time, or manipulating variables to influence the tricks of the circus acts. The game saves progress for the solved puzzles automatically. Up to 200 circuses can be started as new profiles.

name: Half-Life: Year of the Dragon
description: Year of the dragon is a crossover mod that brings the world of Spyro the Dragon to the Half-Life universe!

name: Learn to Code RPG
description: Learn to Code RPG is a visual novel game. In this game, you will teach yourself to code, make friends in the tech industry, and pursue your dream of becoming a developer.

name: Cirro Investigates: The Chilling Truth Behind Deck 13!!
description:
Year 3713 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

Okay, are you recording?

name: Everything You Swallow Will One Day Come Up Like a Stone
description: Sin descripción

name: Double-Entry Bookkeeping Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Spider-Man: Ultimate Power
description: Spider-Man: Ultimate Power is an arcade side-scrolling game, consisting of running, jumping, swinging and fighting elements. There are two modes available: Story and Survival. The Story mode requires completing various missions to progress through the story to save Mary Jane kidnapped by Green Goblin, Sandman and Venom. Missions include various simple tasks such as collecting things, defeating designated enemies or rescuing hostages. The player may select one of a few available characters, each with some special abilities. Unlocking the heroes requires spending rare to find diamonds or real cash. Hard-gained game currency can be used for upgrading the hero's powers or applying power-ups. The gameplay features over 40 locations, divided into several city districts.

name: Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master!
description:
Drum out high scores by accurately playing along with 2 different notes, Don and Ka, in Taiko no Tatsujin: The Drum Master! Includes over 70 songs, local multiplayer mode, and online ranked matches.
Light your drumming spirit on fire!

name: Hide & Seek World
description: Online Multiplayer Hide and Seek! Learn about the world through Google Street View.

name: Sol Raiders
description: Form your crew and prepare for blistering, team-based combat across 3 diverse maps, complete with unique objectives. The ultimate competitive virtual reality experience for up to 8 players. Fun for casual players and professionals alike.

name: Blood West
description: Blood West is an immersive stealth shooter taking place in a nightmare version of a classic wild west setting. The player takes on the role of an outlawed gunslinger brought back to live by strange native spirits to find the root of a curse that has befallen the land. They will explore the dangerous frontier, gather supplies, expand their arsenal, and gain experience to unlock special traits, to best the many monsters and face off with challenging bosses.

name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
description: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.

name: Brave Dwarves
description:
Brave Dwarves is a fantasy platform game where you control one of two Dwarves fighting against 'The Great Evil' that has taken over their underground kingdom.

The player has a warrior and a mage character to choose from; there are ordinary weapons for the warrior, and magic weapons (incantations) for the mage.
Both the magical and ordinary weapon types and strength depends on the power stored in four orbs for controlling the four elements of Fire, Water, Air and Earth.
The orbs are found laying around on the map, and at the beginning, you only have a single weapon & attack type - for the Warrior its a plain melee attack with his axe - but the orbs & diamonds you find lets you use other attack types: the axe can also throw flaming fire, or homing missiles for example. The mage starts out with a wand that can do a water attack. No damage shows any blood, only smokepuffs.

The orbs power source is taken from colored diamonds found in the caves: Green for Earth, Red for Fire, Blue for Water and White for Air.
There are also some diamonds with combined orb energy effects: Light Blue for Air & Water and Purple for Fire & Earth.

The underground Kingdom is divided into 50 platform levels, to finish a level three larger Key-diamonds must be found; one each of Green, Red and White color - these will open the door to the next level. In the unregistered version, only five levels are available, and there are some other limitations - the demo has no bosses for instance.

In the caves are monsters (of course) but also treasure laying around, which is gathered by walking over them, and added to the player score. Touching a monster loses health. Beakers with blue liquid and large red hearts restore health
A highscore list is available in the registered version, as are passwords & savegames letting a player continue from the last saved location.

name: Lovelydoll/Wildmachine
description:
Nordic, a natural born genius, had spent 10 years toiling away making a "mechanical doll", as a way to atone for something in his past. One day the doll gains sentience once a wandering soul resides inside it, and so begins the protagonist’s journey of experiencing what it means to live by interacting with the residents of Wingil, doing errands, battling and mini-games.
There is 1 main story and 3 unique epilogues.

name: Penguin Diner: Restaurant Dash
description: Penny the Penguin goes off track during an Antarctic trek and finds herself completely lost and broke. Help Penny earn enough money to get her home to her family!

name: Alik: Juz Ide Do Szkoly
description: Alik: Juz Ide Do Szkoly is a set of didactic games with the friendly dog Alik, which will surely conquer the hearts of all children and become their friend, helper and guide. In different parts of the garden, the child learns to recognize colors and shapes, compare sizes, evaluate the mutual position of objects, count objects and solve simple tasks requiring logical thinking. In some games single skills are practiced, in others - several at once. Alik patiently explains how to do the task, praises the successes and says when the child has made a mistake.

name: Norse
description: A community driven an adventure MMORPG. We threw aside the traditional MMO and made it for gamers by gamers. In a world of chaos, it's your job as the player to thrive and free the world. The entire game is community based - even the economy is player based.

name: Imperium Revolution
description: Imperium Revolution gives you the ability to capture and train over 200 Imperators and enjoy action-packed battles. Master the fast-paced turn-based strategic combat system and make sure you are always one move ahead of your opponent in order to achieve victory. Meet other Guardians of Everwinter in an all-new Imperium Battle Arena. Fight against other formidable Guardians for the opportunity to claim your rank among the Legendary Guardians.

name: Sword of Atlas
description: Sword of Atlas combines tactical grid combat with turn meter action economy to create a fast, frenetic, and strategic gameplay experience unique amongst the TRPG genre. The real-time action combines with a character-driven story to create a high-stakes environment where your actions will determine the fate of your party.

name: Gold Miner: Vegas
description: Gold Miner: Vegas is an entry in the Gold Miner games. In this title the Gold Miner's goal is to collect enough gold to go to Vegas. The gameplay is largely identical to the original game, where items on a field need to be caught by timing correctly to extend a swinging claw and grab them. The main difference is that the gold miner is now in a cart that can be moved left and right, rather than using a fixed position. The game contains new levels, challenges and gadgets, and new characters, creatures and villains.

name: They Die Tomorrow
description: They Die Tomorrow is a co-op horror investigation game for 1-4 players that sends you to the scene of a murder right before it happens. Use discovered evidence and observed behaviors to identify the killer, but be quick about it... You don't want to be the next victim! Multiple ways to play.

name: Alik: Gry i zabawy
description: Set of didactic games with the friendly dog Alik, which will surely conquer the hearts of all children and become their friend, helper and guide. In different parts of the garden, the child learns to recognize colors and shapes, compare sizes, evaluate the mutual position of objects, count objects and solve simple tasks requiring logical thinking. In some games single skills are practiced, in others - several at once. Alik patiently explains how to do the task, praises the successes and says when the child has made a mistake.

name: The Masters: Survival
description:
Tana (Katana) is testing the new Virtual Proxy Simulation, which is going to be used for training at a school for elementals, as she fights the evil creatures known as the Shadow Dwellers. She is being helped by her Family and Friends who are outside of the system making sure the simulation goes well. All is not what it seems however as she dives deeper into the system and faces off against an old foe, Master Nether.

This is a top-down, hack n' slash, survival game, using Unreal Engine 4. As you progress through each level surviving against waive after waive of enemies called Shadow Dwellers. You have special powers and can summon a companion NPC. There is also one on one boss fights, a survival mode where you survive as long as possible, and rack up a score.

name: Solo Leveling: Arise
description: Solo Leveling: Arise is an action RPG based on the South Korean web novel of the same name.

name: Super Metroid: Redux
description: Super Metroid Redux is an improvement hack for Super Metroid, and a continuation of Super Metroid: GBA Style. This hack aims to give Super Metroid a whole lot of improvements, being it graphical or in mechanics/gameplay, and address some of the annoyances from the original, such as increasing the speed of elevator transitions, improved weapon selection, the diagonal aiming style from Metroid: Zero Mission, and the additional option for widescreen (specific emulators only).

name: QP Kiss
description: QP Kiss is a game developed by Orange_Juice for April Fools' day 2007. It's a parody of their QP Shooting series, featuring genderbent characters in a mock-BL game.

name: Achtung Banditen?!
description: Immersive VR installation for Smartphone, Tablet and PC, in memory of the victims based on the Atlas of Nazi and Fascist Massacres in Italy.

name: Tower of Hanoi
description: Sin descripción

name: PentaBlox
description:
PentaBlox is a single player, shareware implementation of the traditional puzzle Pentominoes. Pentas are shapes made from five connected squares, this means that they all have the same area but a different shape. The player’s task is to fit the shapes into a box. There are twelve shapes in total which must be fitted into a box. The shareware game has just a 6x10 box but the registered game has three other box sizes 5 x 12, 4 x 15, and 3 x 20.

Pieces may be rotated and/or flipped in order to position them in the box and there’s an optional grid setting to help with the planning.

name: Catnight
description: Catnight is an online multiplayer third-person perspective game that will heat up any party. You will not only fight with your opponents and the enormous amount of furry bullets in the air, but you will also need to survive special gameplay circumstances, which will make every match more dynamic and funnier.

name: Arre Unicornio
description: A new concept of the board game Arre Unicornio now driven to the madness that it can regale us with in video game format. Arre Unicornio is an online multiplayer video game for 2 to 8 players. Frantic party game of hidden roles in a madhouse. Mix of point and click and use of cards.

name: Elaborate Lands
description: Elaborate Lands is a relaxing strategy game with a deep building system. It combines unique gameplay mechanics with elements from 4X and city-builder games. Construct buildings, gather resources, research technologies and expand your territory. Different maps and biomes offer endless replayability.

name: Sunset World Online
description: Sunset World Online is a 2D side-scroller MMORPG with four unique elements to choose from; wind, water, earth, and fire! Each element has its' role, bringing unique experiences in Expeditions. Gather your party and embark on a journey to Edge World!

name: A True History of the Adamant Gambit
description:
Year 3801 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

eventually, seeds find a way to grow

name: Andreas VII
description:
Inspired by the works of Yames, Andreas VII is a puzzle centered talking-sim. Complete tasks, converse with ground control and lose your sense of self as you travel further in space than any who have come before you.

How known are you willing to be to know, how much are you prepared to give up?

name: Seven Cities
description: Seven Cities is an Action-RPG which takes place in an urban contemporary world. A near-future New York full of intrigue. You play as an Outsider along with a robotic companion. Both will evolve through many intensive fights to find the 7 CEROM's.

name: Darling Pet
description: Mobile otome game by LucyDream about a girl who turns into a dog and meets four handsome furry bachelors.

name: Steamed Hams: The Graphic Adventure
description:
You've invited Superintendent Chalmers over for lunch! He'll be here any second and is expecting a well cooked roast!

Fortunately, you have been preparing just such a roast all morning! Hopefully you don't accidentally burn it and set certain events into motion...

name: Crewmember Pigeon and the Case of the Burgled Buttons
description:
Year 3871 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

You're good at solving mysteries, right?

name: Tour de France 2018
description: Embody the greatest champions and hit the official track of the Tour de France 2018. Enjoy all the intensity of this legendary race: attack, follow the best trajectories, and carry out the finest racing tactics to lead your team to victory and earn the mythical Yellow Jersey.

name: Turbo Sliders Unlimited
description: Turbo Sliders Unlimited is a spiritual successor of many classic top-down racing games, but in 3D and with modern online features and extensive customization and modding possibilities. It goes far beyond being just a racing game - it is a community driven platform where anyone can create their own levels, vehicles and game modes. It can be played as a serious esports game or as a fun casual game. It can be played alone, as online multiplayer or as local multiplayer.

name: I Am A I
description: I AM A I is a cartoony, third-person, open level design, sandbox assassin game. In case that description sounds like some corporate gaming-industry gobbledygook, imagine if Nintendo produced a Hitman game. You play as a small robot that is capable of wielding (as of right now) over 100 unique items and are tasked to assassinate one main target and execute dozens of challenges per level.

name: Papiny Dochki
description: A point'n'click quest based on a famous Russian TV series.

name: Zagadki Tigrenka Usika
description: Sin descripción

name: Abridge
description: Abridge is an abstract, Sokoban puzzle game. Select pieces to move, pull and shift them around into a goal. The colorful shapes on them determine their movement and abilities. Remove them all from the board to solve these hand-crafted, challenging puzzles.

name: Neko to Sakana
description: A top-down, omnidirectional shooting game. Play as a cat and shoot fish to make sushi and power up your ship.

name: Sunlight In A Tin
description:
A tiny spaceship hurtles through the interstellar void, powered by a roaring nuclear reactor. You are its only engineer.
This seems safe.

name: ScreenPlay
description: ScreenPlay is a cinema-themed comedy CCG with simultaneous and strategic gameplay. Enter a hyper-exaggerated movie-making universe and compete against other filmmakers in creating fictional movies on the fly.

name: Magic Survival
description:
Hack and Slash you can enjoy with one-hand control

Too many death magics have been abused for the decades of wizard war...
The spirit living in nature becomes a demon by remnants of the magics that pervaded it, and it devours all living creatures.

Wipe out infected spirits coming from everywhere with various magic

name: Dark Souls III: The Convergence
description:
The Convergence mod grants a whole new Dark Souls 3 experience with plenty of new systems, spell schools, weapons, bosses, map designs and more.

The game maps have been extensively overhauled and feature new surprises and challenges, hoping to reignite the excitement of a first playthrough.

The three basic magic schools of vanilla have each been split into four distinct sub-schools, making 12 in total. Each new spell school has its own distinct playstyle and progression, as well as custom spells, catalysts, vendors and armour.

Infusions for all weapons have been completely overhauled, making every weapon viable.

All bosses have been revamped somehow, and some are even completely new.

name: Painturio
description:
paintur.io is a free online multiplayer game where players have to guess the word that is drawn by one of them within a limited time. The principle is very simple, so it is possible to have fun with the whole family or a group of friends.

This game allows you to showcase your drawing skills, while using your overflowing imagination. Faster you are, more points you earn and you win the game!

The game is playable on any device which can access to internet.

name: Pebble
description: 3D-Platformer where you play as Pebble who moves objects in time in search for his parents. Uncover the story by exploring new environments as you go on to find unique setpieces throughout the game.

name: Invitation to Fear
description: Invitation to Fear is a survival horror game for 1 to 4 players. After receiving one of the invitations, you will wake up in an unfamiliar place. Before long, you will realize that a terrifying creature is wandering around the building. Don't let "her" find you.

name: Soup
description:
Soup ver 0.9 is a production loosely based on LSD, a trippy dream recollection available only on the Playstation console. Choose the first option to play in full screen mode. A different part of the adventure is unlocked for each new game attempted by the player.

Hold the left shift key to look around, and touch a wall to exit any room. Describing the game any further is equivalent to providing possible spoilers.

name: Of Life and Land
description: Of Life and Land is a charming settlement-building strategy game paired with a rich simulation experience. Every animal and plant tries to find their place in nature while you lead your villagers to their future. Expand to different regions and trade with local factions to gain needed resources.

name: Scholar of the Arcane Arts
description: Scholar of the Arcane Arts is a Roguelike Action RPG where every spell you cast interacts with one another. Learn new spells, solve puzzles, unlock secret dungeons, and defeat monstrous beings to save the world invaded by five Planes of magic!

name: The Virtual Museum of Dead-Wifery
description: Meet Mrs. Groan- in exciting color. The didactic meets the sensational when "America's Favoritest Little Dead Wife 2008" explores the moral perils of "Wife Gaming"- taking viewers on an odyssey filled with lessons sure to make you laugh and cry.

name: Space Dragons
description: Space Dragons is a classic "shoot em up" horizontal shooting game, in which you can choose different ships with unique characteristics and abilities to destroy tons of invading aliens. During the adventure you will run into powerful bosses and explosive enemies. Get upgrades for your ship, weapons and much more to make your way through the meaty and bloody path that awaits you in Space Dragons.

name: Mintroid
description: Sin descripción

name: Nebraska
description: Nebraska takes place as a journalist writing a book about mid-west America, who runs out of gas in a rural area of Nebraska. Players will explore and uncover the secret facility that lies beneath the attraction and discover the terrible experiments that have taken place there.

name: When the Bomb Goes Off
description: OK, here's the deal. The Bomb will go off in 5 seconds, and everybody has something to do before they go. The trick is, you need to explode the RIGHT bomb. Got it?

name: Endeavor
description: Endeavor is a game about a dwarf trying to uncover an ancient secret. Or maybe it's about exploring, climbing, and swimming. Or perhaps it's about collecting powerups and treasure. Or possibly it's just about killing things.

name: Chemistry and Physics
description:
When you agreed to meet him, you thought it would all end amicably. That you could go away and close this chapter of your life. Instead, you're now running from him. Bad news: no cell phone reception. You can't call for help. You're stuck. Good news: this is familiar territory. This is your lab. Can you get out of this alive?

A short and violent story written for Ectocomp 2013.

name: The Recruit
description: Try your hand at the Real Life Interactive Gaming Simulacra! You'll face a variety of challenges and simulations and have a chance to win some money and great prizes. Apply today!

name: Enigma
description: Eyes can see, and a mind can think. Insanity is just one step away. You are in a room. That's where you are, and you know exactly what is going on. But the truth is hard to take.

name: Orevore Courier
description: Sin descripción

name: I Can't Remember a Time I Didn't Need You
description: A fog has overtaken a city. Everyone who was in the city has now changed. Word spreads that this fog can support life that isn’t supported on earth. You are going to see if the fog will support your life or if you are the reason the fog has come.

name: Tomotoru: Hello Kitty Happy Life
description:
Spend time with your favorite adorable Sanrio characters!
Put yourself at ease as they play in the room you design for them.
Use the AR camera to bring your friends into your life.
Create lovely memories together with your friends!

name: La-Mulana 2: The Tower of Oannes
description: The first piece of downloadable content for La-Mulana 2, the newly-added map – The Tower of Oannes. Ranks with the previous instalment’s Hell Temple in difficulty, acting as an optional distraction from the main journey, filled with brutal level design and humour akin to a Masocore title.

name: Voxel Horizon
description: Create your own voxel world! Collaborate with your friends at your own level! The battle over destructible terrain!

name: After a Long Journey
description:
Year 3999 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

the planet was supposed to be empty...

name: Disney's Magical Quest 2 Starring Mickey & Minnie
description: The Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey and Minnie is the sequel to The Magical Quest starring Mickey Mouse. This time, the game features both mice, who must discover why the circus suffered an attack from Baron Pete.

name: Arsenal
description:
Arsenal is a 3D First Person Shooter multiplayer game for the Fabwelt Gaming Ecosystem and Metaverse. It utilizes in-game NFTs as assets, collectibles, and utilities. In-game assets are all blockchain collectibles that users utilize in playing the game. As blockchain-based items, in-game assets can be freely withdrawn from the game for other uses such as collateral on decentralized lending protocol, staking, gifting, or passing it down as an inheritance. In-game assets can be seen as a commodity.

It’s fully playable as a WebGL game on your browser. It has a “battleground” look and feels and it’s fully integrated with blockchain technology. Pay to Play and Play to Earn is integrated in such a way, it attracts everyday players as well as professional players around the world, to get incentives and fun. Many different types of maps are included like big maps for sniping, and small maps for fast close combat.

name: Fantasia Sango Mysteria
description:
*** This Game is only available in Chinese ***

A brand new chapter in the Fantasy Three Kingdoms series, once again experiencing the coexistence of human beings, gods, demons and monsters, and a world where reality and reality are intertwined.

name: Transformers: Battlegrounds - Complete Edition
description:
Bumblebee and the Autobots have a new commander - you. Assemble your squad and roll out for a battle that will rage from Central City to Cybertron. Choose heroes including Windblade and Optimus Prime, each with unique attacks and abilities. Use each environment to your advantage, taking cover in desert sandstorms and battling your foes in city streets. And charge your Energon to unleash devastating Ultimate Abilities. Then visit the Arcade for local multiplayer battles with the Decepticons and more. It’s the Tramsformers game you’ve waited an eternity for!

Transformers: Battlegrounds - Complete Edition includes:
- a copy of the base game
- Gold Autobot Skin Pack
- Energon Autobot Skin Pack
- Battle Autobot Skin Pack
- Neon Autobot Skin Pack
- Nemesis Prime & Goldfire Bumblebee Skin Pack
- CUBE Game - Arcade Add-on
- Transformers: Battlegrounds - Shattered Spacebridge

name: Maia
description:
Ruby video calls her girlfriend Maia. They haven't talked in awhile.
A short kinetic novel that contains: 1000 words, 1 CG and 1 'cute' girlfriend.

name: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine
description: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!?

name: Two Point Campus: Enrollment Edition
description:
Build the university of your dreams with Two Point Campus, the follow up management sim with a twist from the creators of Two Point Hospital. Get to know your students, explore their personalities and fulfill their wants and needs. Craft buildings, choose courses, hire the best staff and build an academic institution to stand the test of time.

The Enrollment Edition includes:
- Exclusive Enrollment Edition packaging and artwork
- A Fold out paper campus poster map, slightly bigger than A3 in size
- Two Point Bonus DLC pack, including exclusive in game items for both Two Point Campus & Two Point Hospital

name: The Fox Awaits Me: Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: The Fox Awaits Me, Soundtrack CD, Theme Song CD, Mascot Figure, Digital Artbook Download Code (While supplies last)

name: My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine: Limited Edition
description:
My Girlfriend is a Mermaid!? Refine: Limited Edition includes;
- The game (region free)
- The soundtrack CD
- The theme song CD
- A Mascot figure
- A digital artbook download code (while supplies last)

name: League of Kingdoms
description: League of Kingdoms is the world's first MMO Strategy game owned & powered by users. On the genesis continent, all lands are owned and governed by you. You can actively own, develop, launch alliance warfares, and earn rewards by contributing to the development of the continent.

name: Rival Fury
description: A three-dimensional street brawler, expanding the way you fight. Featuring atmospheric side scrolling arenas with unique depth and camera style. An immersive and fast paced gang busting experience. Running at your opponents will help you own the streets and increase your martial arts ability.

name: Apex Legends: Defiance
description: Madness Takes Control

name: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss
description: Johnny Boy: Red Moon's Kiss is a mature, four-part, gritty interactive drama series, shrouded in crime, secrets and the supernatural. A proper adaptation to werewolf fiction, with deep character development.

name: Ueki no Housoku: Jingi Sakuretsu! Nouryokusha Battle
description: Ueki no Housoku: Jingi Sakuretsu! Nouryokusha Battle is a 32-bit classic 2D fighter action game based on the manga and anime series The Law of Ueki (Ueki no Housoku).

name: Medarot G: Kabuto Version
description:
Medarot G is a 2D action game released in 2002 for the Game Boy Advance. It was the first Medarot action game to be released in Japan.

In the Kabuto version the player starts with Dichotom. The game mainly features characters and Medarots from Medarot 5, but some major characters from Medarot 2 also make an appearance.

The gameplay and battle system were also used in Medabots AX, which was released in North America a month earlier.

name: Deadly Tecknology
description: Sin descripción

name: Fantasia Sango 1
description:
*** This Game is only available in Chinese ***

"Fantasy Three Kingdoms" is an RPG stand-alone game developed and operated by Yujun Technology. The battle screen of the game is a 2D screen, but because of the 45-degree viewing angle, it has a three-dimensional effect. The combat system is turn-based and semi-real-time.

name: Fantasia Sango 4
description:
This is the fourth installment of the role-playing series of stand-alone games "Fantasy Three Kingdoms".

The background of the story is set about ten years after the first generation. In addition to the latest developments in the series, it also inherits the battles of the Three Kingdoms and the unique world view of previous generations. Historical figures and military commanders also appeared in this generation.

name: Fantasia Sango 3
description:
*** This Game is only available in Chinese ***

This work is the third part of the role-playing series of stand-alone games "Fantasy Three Kingdoms". The plot of this work continues the unique world view of the previous work and develops the story of a new group of protagonists.

name: GuitarFreaks 4thMix & DrumMania 3rdMix
description: GuitarFreaks and DrumMania are rock-oriented music video games. In GuitarFreaks, the player uses a controller to simulate the playing of an electric guitar, while in DrumMania, the player must hit the drum parts when the notes reach the bottom of the screen in order to fill in missing drum parts from a song.

name: MLB The Show 22
description:
Experience faster, deeper and more intense moment-to-moment match action on the field, with a variety of game modes for all you rookie players and returning seasoned vets.

Every pitch. Every hit. Every win. Make your mark and Own The Show in MLB The Show 22.

name: DrumMania 3rdMix
description: In DrumMania, the player must hit the drum parts when the notes reach the bottom of the screen in order to fill in missing drum parts from a song

name: Pachillinko
description: Pachillinko is a mix of japanese Pachinko and western Plinko style game, set in neon synthwave design with some retro feeling of 80s. Relaxing mouse-only clicking gameplay allows you to sit back and just chill...

name: Chromarena
description: Chromarena is a 2D top-down twin-stick arena shooter. Combine offense and defense to tear through hordes of color-coded enemies to unlock new guns and set high scores. Form short and medium-term plans, dodge attacks with fully responsive controls, and get into a flow state.

name: Entropy
description: Fly between incomprehensible galaxies in this experimental micro game!

name: Roll Ball Adventures
description: Roll ball Adventures is an arcade game, the main character is a red ball that must overcome the traps, obstacles, and enemies of each level and get to the goal.

name: Medieval Battlegrounds
description: Set in medieval times, you must vanquish your foes! Fight again players in 6-man teams or join together and fight hordes of AI enemies. Battle with swords, axes, bows, and magic. Teams are formed in-game, so play with your friends, or against them! Team up and take down enemies and friends alike!

name: Battlecaster
description: BATTLECASTER is a challenging fast paced arena roguelike. Develop mastery over relentless enemies and overcome difficult encounters. Use abilities strategically to control the ring of combat.

name: Entropy: Zero 2
description:
The pessimistic, wisecracking, door-kicking zealot known as 'Bad Cop' is back.

Command a small army of Combine synths and soldiers on a Northern campaign to capture Dr. Judith Mossman.

Tread in the wake of Gordon Freeman at Nova Prospekt. Explore the mysterious 'Arbeit Communications' facility. Discover what lies beneath. Drive an APC through the arctic wastes. Confront the rebels on their doorstep and uncover a long-forgotten secret.

name: Dead Earth Zombies
description: Dead Earth is an open world survival game, choose what you want to do in this world, build a small base, hunt for food, survive and explore the open world, play the game your way, ohh... and try to stay off the menu.

name: Eletar Hero
description: Eletar Hero is a 2D platformer where you use the ability you have acquired from an ancient alien race to traverse through different maze-like levels, defeat many bosses and collect the other abilities the ancient Eletar left behind; all to stop a madman from taking over the world.

name: Dots and Dashes
description: A rendition of the pen and paper classic game of Dots and Dashes. Player settable board size, with ability to to play against other players, or the program or both. Seven computer playing levels will allow players of all skill levels to enjoy the game. Leader boards are available to record wins.

name: Leganda
description: Leganda is a game combining survival, exploration, industry and strategy. You buy a forgotten energy company. Develop as you explore the different islands and fight the enemies there!

name: Circuit City
description: A relaxing city builder set on the tiny scale of a circuit board, where your data agents and electronic components sing a unique, procedurally-generated chiptune song for you as they work.

name: The House of Big people
description: Two Russian students Ivan and Alexander were expelled from the institute, but the knowledge remained with them. One day, while drinking beer, they come up with a brilliant idea - to create a superman who will not need food, and will work 24 hours a day.

name: Ampguard
description: Ampguard is a rogue-like game with a unique combat system and nasty monsters. Combine your skills and use them in the best possible way to emerge victorious from the battle against the Yokai.

name: Off-Road Farming
description: Off-Road Farming is an unusual off-road farming simulator. In the game you will find unique locations, interesting levels, as well as various natural phenomena!

name: SCP Observer
description: SCP Observer is a survival horror game, where you are trapped in a security room and you have to monitor the foundations camera system for threats and manage the power carefully in order to survive. All of this while you try not to be killed by some of the SCP Foundation most terrifying creatures.

name: Project Speed 2
description: Project Speed 2 is a 3D Racing Game with multiple maps and vehicles to choose from made with the Unreal Engine.

name: Buy Me Some Soup
description: Heya! Long time no see. I just have a small -tiny- little favor to ask of you, could you buy me some soup? ...How? Well, that's for you to find out!

name: Magnus Imago
description: Magnus Imago is an atmospheric journey through a mysterious world of characters, traces and symbols. The task of the player is to solve the puzzles, using proper combinations of objects, finding them in the environment around him.

name: My Father My Son
description: Two castaways: a father and son end up on a deserted island after an unexpected storm. The sailboat cruise that was to bring them together turns into a deadly fight for survival. The characters can only count on each other.

name: Clive vs. Hives 2
description: Blast aliens to pieces and start a rebellion in this fast paced pixel art top down shooter with a range of unique weapons and combat abilities.

name: The Matriarch
description: An online party game where only 1 player is not an Imposter. Play as a Nun and emulate the bot behavior to avoid raising suspicions. Play as the Matriarch and identify all the player-controlled nuns before one of them escapes the Satanic convent!

name: Minecart Madness
description: Minecart Madness is a 2D arcade infinite-runner in the style of early platforming games. Jump your minecart over frequent and fast-approaching obstacles and try for the highscore!

name: Alien Space Bastards
description: Alien Space Bastards is a procedurally generated 3D arcade style shooter. The aliens are attacking in force and you must utilize all the weaponry you have to survive the onslaught and bring piece to the galaxy. Multiple power ups will assist you on your suicide mission, good luck and fight bravely!

name: Herbheim's Mine
description: Last warrior of the Herbheim's clan, it's your duty to defend the last family mine

name: Bessarabian Nightmares
description: Help close the gates of hell, kill bosses, find keys and move on. Good luck!

name: One against the wind
description: A first-person shooter in which there are two game modes. 1. Destroy the enemy generator. 2. Steal the enemy's documents.

name: Within Skerry
description: The Accumulation of Evil is an ancient book stating that if enough evil energy is concentrated in a single area, a dark force may be born.Humans can sometimes be very horrible creatures - but sometimes, it is taken a bit too far.

name: Spirits Chronicles: Born in Flames - Collector's Edition
description: Save the kingdom and tame the magical creatures! You are the only one who can embark on a dangerous journey. Are you ready to accept the challenge?

name: Mary
description: Mary - is an adventure shooter with surviving elements where you will survive in zombie apocalypse playing as a girl named Jane.

name: Purry Furry Adventurry
description: Help Kat escape from her loving owner in this cute little endless runner!

name: Dungeon Castle
description: You have been summoned to an unknown castle. And you will receive one mission. Gather various voice data and approach the truth. And you have to delete the root node of the network metabus that is connected to all that truth. In that "Dungeon Castle" where you are.

name: Melania
description: Solve puzzles and find out all the secrets of the disappearance of civilization in a gloomy 2D platformer.

name: Mago: The Villain's Burger
description: Mago: The Villain's Burger is a retro 2D platformer that puts us in the boots of a sorcerer, who was unfortunate enough to eat evil overlord's food. Now he has to rescue his beloved princess from the dinner menu of the evil Gourmet! Nostalgia awaits!

name: Shadow of Egypt
description: Shadow of Egypt - is an adventurous 3D shooter with surviving and hardcore elements where you will fight with ancient Egyptian evil.

name: Bomber Blok
description: It's time to get dirty! Equipped with your legendary jackhammer, and a bit of TNT, dig your way down into the puzzling underground caves of an hazardous alien planet abounding in marvelous gems.

name: Party Rush!!
description: Here we present, a cynical RPG with close to 160,000 patterns of party making. Choose your favorite from about 100 different characters and save the pixelated world. Some events spawn only during certain days of the week. No need to worry, "somebody from another dimension" will help you.

name: Swords and Sandals Immortals
description: Gladiator! Grab your sword, equip your sandals and take on the world in multiplayer Swords and Sandals! Brutal turn-based combat where gladiators can lose limbs, wield guitars and yell so loudly enemy heads will fall off. This is the most fun you'll ever have in the arena!

name: Funny Street Football
description: Introducing Funny Street Football - a 2D side-view sports simulator in which you have to win the street football world championship!

name: Knight Riot
description: Knight Riot - 2d Slasher with a side view, the player uses the cursor to control the direction of the strike and cuts the enemies who are on the attack line.

name: Feeble
description: FEEBLE is an interactive simulation game. Meet FEEBLE, the only surviving character in the village devastated by the epidemic, and save FEEBLE from the Grim Reaper. Look around the village, use various puzzles to protect from the Grim Reaper and save the FEEBLE.

name: Minimal Dungeon RPG
description: Minimal Dungeon RPG is a Simple Dungeon Crawler of RPG. Multiple rooms are connected into dungeons. Tasks, monsters, and rewards are all simplified into squares in the rooms. You can just click on the squares to play and crawl through the dungeons.

name: Turn off the light
description: A gloomy platformer in which you have to get out of the desperate consciousness of the main character. The unique ambient and minimalistic graphics will create a tense atmosphere. Explore the game space and avoid all its aggressive inhabitants.
